title: AYA Niseko Atelier: Minimalist Luxury Escape
description:
Experience minimalist luxury at AYA Niseko Atelier—a retreat designed for modern travelers who appreciate simplicity and refined design.

Set against the breathtaking backdrop of the mountain, every element of the atelier is carefully curated to blend contemporary comforts with the serene beauty of Niseko. The space features airy, open-plan living areas with clean lines and natural materials, creating an atmosphere of calm and understated elegance.

During the day, enjoy uninterrupted views and a light, uncluttered environment that invites exploration of the nearby slopes. In the evening, the venue transforms into a sanctuary of relaxation where guests can unwind, share intimate conversations, or indulge in gourmet meals prepared using locally sourced ingredients.

AYA Niseko Atelier is more than just a place to stay—it's an immersive experience designed to inspire, relax, and rejuvenate, making it the perfect hideaway for those who travel light yet seek memorable experiences.
address: 4-chome-4-5 Nisekohirafu 1 Jo, Kutchan, Abuta District, Hokkaido 044-0080, Japan

title: Sangsuri Beach Villa 1
description:
Sangsuri Beach Villa 1 is the largest of a trio of beachfront villas, offering accommodation for up to 32 guests. Featuring 8 double bedrooms and 2 dormitories designed for children or young adults, every room enjoys breathtaking sea views.

On the beach level, the villa boasts ample sun beds, sofas, and a large lawn ideal for games and events. Relax in the spa sala or enjoy a cocktail on the panoramic deck complete with a jacuzzi for six and oversized outdoor sofas. The master bedroom is conveniently located just steps from the jacuzzi for ultimate relaxation.
address: 33, The Cove Samui Co. Ltd, 56, Bo Put, Amphoe Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

amenities: Multi-use area available as/for (additional dining capacity (e.g. for children) - breakfast corner - buffet set-up - cocktail bar)
Beach sports, Kayaks, stand-up paddle boards
Large lawn for badminton or other games​
Sun-tanning by the pool or beach
Hammocks and swings by the beach

title: Sangsuri Beach Villa 2
description:
Sangsuri Beach Villa 2 features 7 double bedrooms—all with spectacular sea views—and a dormitory designed for 6 children or young adults. The beach level is the heart of the villa, hosting the main pool, an oversized jacuzzi, and a spacious living, dining, and TV area that can be enjoyed either open-air or air-conditioned.

Additional highlights include a show kitchen, a beachfront deck complete with a BBQ/bar area, and a dedicated spa/massage sala. A double bedroom adjacent to the pool further enhances the convenience and luxury of this property.
address: 33, The Cove Samui Co. Ltd, 56, Bo Put, Amphoe Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

amenities: Beach front dining deck with BBQ facilities
Multi-use area available as/for additional dining capacity (e.g. for children - breakfast counter/buffet - buffet set-up - cocktail bar)
Large lawn for badminton or other games
Sun-tanning by the pool or beach

title: Sangsuri Beach Villa 3
description:
Sangsuri Beach Villa 3 offers an intimate yet spacious setting with 6 double bedrooms and a dormitory for 6 children or young adults. On the beach level, a very large double bedroom can accommodate 2 to 4 guests. A unique beachfront bedroom sala connects via a wooden bridge to an oversized jacuzzi and massage sala on one side, and to a secluded beach area with comfortable sun beds and sofas on the other.

This villa is perfect for guests seeking a blend of privacy, luxury, and direct access to the beach, ensuring a truly immersive tropical escape.
address: 33, The Cove Samui Co. Ltd, 56, Bo Put, Amphoe Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

amenities: Multi-use area available as/for additional dining capacity (e.g. for children - breakfast corner - buffet set-up - cocktail bar)
20 m infinity pool with large pool Sala
2 jacuzzis: 1 outdoor for 10 guests, 1 indoor in Master bedroom
Playdeck with sofa near the pool sala
Large lawn for badminton or other games
Massage at the beach front sala
Sun-tanning by the pool or beach
Sundeck with direct access to beach

title: Mia Estate
description:
Welcome to Mia Estate – a tropical beachfront luxury residence on Koh Samui designed for big groups and special events. This expansive estate comprises three gorgeous villas with a total of 17 bedrooms, making it ideal for large families, weddings, and birthday parties.

Indulge in five-star services while enjoying magnificent ocean views and a contemporary design inspired by tropical living. The estate features its very own clubhouse complete with massage rooms, a steam room, a kids club, a fitness center, and a home cinema. Every detail is designed to exceed your expectations and create unforgettable memories.

Come and experience the ultimate in luxury, space, and service at Mia Estate.

amenities: Airport transfer included: 1 car(s) maximum, both ways
Gym equipment at the Private Villa
Highlights: Alfresco dining and multiple living areas
Cinema, gym, massage room & steam room
